allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add admin check-in/out feature and fix auth registration resilience

- Add note field to CheckIn model, adminCheckIn mutation, and
  eventUncheckedAthletes query for admin attendance management
- Add AdminCheckInModal with searchable athlete list, status selector
  \(On Time/Late/Excused\), optional note, and batch check-in toggle
- Add inline Check Out button on attendance rows for checked-in athletes
- Fix registration flow: handle "already confirmed" Cognito state on retry,
  auto-create DB user record in backend context for authenticated users
  without one, require auth for createOrganization to prevent orphan orgs
- Fix RequireAuth race condition: include lazy query "called" state in
  isLoading to prevent premature redirect during GET_ME fetch
- Fix createUser upsert to update profile fields for existing users
- Redirect users with no org memberships to profile page instead of
  showing app download page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
